com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class ExternalTextToSpeech

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.ExternalTextToSpeech
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityResultListener, ITextToSpeech

    public class ExternalTextToSpeech
extends Object
implements ITextToSpeech, ActivityResultListener
    Wrapper class for delegating calls to an external text-to-speech library for devices lacking an internal text-to-speech library (pre-1.6).
    Author:
    markf@google.com (Mark Friedman)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.ITextToSpeech
